<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()).replace(/.*ï¼š/,'');
var book = {
	name: o('h2'),
	author: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(3)'),
	kind: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(4)') + ',' + o('.block_txt2 p:eq(5)').replace(/ä¸­|å·²/,''),
	latest: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(7)').replace(/^(æ­£æ–‡|VIPç« èŠ‚|æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚)?(\s+|_)|[\(ï¼ˆã€].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨].*/g, ''),
	intro: 'ã€€ã€€æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°:' + o('.block_txt2 p:eq(6)').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.intro_info').replace(/\d+/, '').replace(/\s+/,'\n'),
	cover: J.select('.block_img2 img').attr('src'),
	url: 'http://www.shencou.com/read/' + parseInt(baseUrl.match(/id=(\d+)/)[1]/1000) + '/' + baseUrl.match(/id=(\d+)/)[1] + '/index.html',
};

</js>

	author: og('novel:author'),

  wordCount: o('.book-cell').match(/æ¨è(.*)å­—/)[1].replace(/\s/g,''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(æ­£æ–‡|VIPç« èŠ‚|æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚)?(\s+|_)|[\(ï¼ˆã€].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨].*/g, '') + ' â€¢ ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),

	cover: og('image'),

};
